SEARCH
Package com.example.aurora

Class EntrantLogicTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.aurora.EntrantLogicTest
public class EntrantLogicTest extends Object
Pure-Java logic tests for entrant-related behaviour. These tests deliberately avoid Mockito, Android, or Firestore types so that they run as regular local unit tests with no extra dependencies.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    filterEventsByAvailability_onlyShowsOpenEvents()
    Verifies that filtering by availability only keeps events that are marked as open and excludes closed events.
    void
    geoRequired_preventsJoinWhenEntrantHasNoLocation()
    Verifies that when an event requires geolocation, an entrant with no location cannot join, but can still join events where geolocation is optional.
    void
    geoRequiredFlag_blocksJoinWhenNoLocation()
    If geoRequired is true on an event, we can use that as a simple flag to block joining when the entrant has no location.
    void
    joinWaitingList_addsUserWhenNotPresent()
    When an entrant joins the waiting list, their ID should be added if it is not already present.
    void
    joinWaitingList_doesNotDuplicateUser()
    Joining twice should not create duplicates in the waiting list.
    void
    leaveWaitingList_removesUser()
    Leaving the waiting list should remove the user if present.
